slots.name: category
slots.label: Status Category
slots.description: Add a categorical status column (e.g., Healthy, Warning, Error). Create a formula in Luzmo: IF([Score] >= 81, 'Healthy', IF([Score] >= 51, 'Warning', 'Error')). Each unique value will appear in the legend with its count.

slots.name: size
slots.label: Record Count
slots.description: Add any column with COUNT aggregation to count records per category. This shows in the legend (e.g., '500'). Typically use an ID column or any column with COUNT aggregation.

slots.name: measure
slots.label: Metric Value (for Center KPI)
slots.description: Add the numeric metric column with AVERAGE aggregation. This displays in the center of the donut chart (e.g., '72'). Must use AVERAGE aggregation for weighted average calculation.

slots.name: order
slots.label: Order (Optional)
slots.description: Add a numeric column (e.g., _ORDER) to control color assignment and display order. 0=Healthy, 1=Warning, 2=Error, etc. If omitted, uses hardcoded order: Healthy, Warning, Error.

slots.name: legend
slots.label: Title (Optional)
slots.description: Add any column to use its name as the chart title. The column NAME will be displayed (not its values). If omitted, shows default title.
